name: Prototype Stratos
description:
Prototype stratos is a racing hovercraft game inspired by the jump levels in Rayman 3. The goal is to collect the most points by collecting cubes or being the quickest to the finish line. The game is currently in the prototype phase.

The hovercraft's speed is controlled by W and S. W accelerates the hovercraft and S brakes. A and D are turning left and right. Space is for jumping.  If you fall of the platform you can use R or Esc.

If you want to stay updated on the game or follow the development, consider following my instagram or twitter:

If you have suggestions you can contact me on social media, it will help a lot to decide the direction of the game.
